q: 30, 2009 But the companies say it is the only way to form a credible competitor to the industry's Goliath, Google, which holds 65 percent of the market for Internet search advertising. We actually think this is one of those cases where us coming together will provide more competition to the market leader, not less, Microsoft chief executive Steve Ballmer said in a conference call.
